title.native: ドールズフロントライン

description:
In the fallout of nuclear war, the last of humanity survives with the help of life-like androids known as Dolls. Built to serve, some fight in wars as Tactical Dolls or T-Dolls. Some of them and their newly assigned human commander are sent on missions to face a new rogue threat, Sangvis Ferri.

(Source: Funimation)

tags.name: Guns
tags.description: Prominently features the use of guns in combat.

tags.name: Artificial Intelligence
tags.description: Intelligent non-organic machines that work and react similarly to humans.

tags.name: War
tags.description: Partly or completely set during wartime.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Military
tags.description: Centered around the life and activities of military personnel.

tags.name: Conspiracy
tags.description: Contains one or more factions controlling or attempting to control the world from the shadows.

tags.name: Memory Manipulation
tags.description: Prominently features a character(s) who has had their memories altered.

tags.name: Amnesia
tags.description: Prominently features a character(s) with memory loss.

tags.name: Dissociative Identities
tags.description: A case where one or more people share the same body.

tags.name: Post-Apocalyptic
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a world or civilization after a global disaster.

tags.name: Foreign
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a country outside the country of origin.

tags.name: Pandemic
tags.description: Prominently features a disease prevalent over a whole country or the world.

node.description:
Originating from [Studio Deen](https://anilist.co/studio/37/), where he initially worked as a composite artist.

_Note: Not to be confused with the [other director](https://anilist.co/staff/101468/) by the same name._

Team Shachi (チームしゃち) formerly known as Team Syachihoko is a 4-member idol girl group represented by Stardust Promotion under Section 3's 3Bjunior. The group was formed in 2012 by Section 3's managing director Ryoji Fujishita and is based in the city of Nagoya, Aichi prefecture. Team Shachi is the youngest sister group for both Momoiro Clover Z and Shiritsu Ebisu Chugaku.
Hara Kazuaki is a CG animator working for Asahi Production.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/神宮司訓之)

He does a wide range of design works.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/FARfromani) | [Blog](https://farfromanimation.com/)

Freelance Translator & Interpreter, Production Manager & Animation Blogger. President of the animation studio Buta Productions. Also known as the animation producer of the Otaku-Vs original series Otachan!, a foreign short animated series. Often collaborates with [Blou](https://anilist.co/staff/213397/Blou).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/FARfromani) | [Blog](https://farfromanimation.com/)

Freelance Translator & Interpreter, Production Manager & Animation Blogger. President of the animation studio Buta Productions. Also known as the animation producer of the Otaku-Vs original series Otachan!, a foreign short animated series. Often collaborates with [Blou](https://anilist.co/staff/213397/Blou).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/HEYSUEZO) | [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/jallenlord/)

Affiliated with [Crunchyroll](https://anilist.co/studio/6421) as an ADR Director.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/morganlaure) | [Website](http://www.morganlaure.com/)

An American film actress, voice actress and director.
ADR Engineer at FUNimation Entertainment, however has since expanded to also being a Mixing Engineer.
Akio Matsuda is a producer who works for Shogakukan.
